name: 0Gravity (itch)
description:
This is my first game. Therefore, I especially appreciate the opinion and constructive criticism from users. Please write all your fantasies. Together we will create a game that will become obligatory with all friends in the evening gatherings.

I plan to add many more varied levels (with traps, block changes, endless levels).

The player will also be able to choose from several additional types of weapons (fire grenades, portable black holes, turrets, time change generators, combat inhibitors).

The levels will need to add the main weapon that appears over time, different from the initial one.

And the main one is online multiplayer. I want to be able to play the game not only in the same room, but also with friends on the network.

At the moment, the gameplay is honed by many hours of sessions with my friends.

There are in 0Gravity for now:

- local multiplayer
- 9 levels (closed, open-space, with deadly lasers)
- 1 mod for 2-4 players (versus)
- pew-pew guns and explosive grenades
